summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the supplemental assessment or re-assessment and supplemental assessment or re-assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1444, for the improvement of 2nd Avenue from Yesler Way to Virginia Street, in the City of Seattle, by the installation of a system of cluster lights along the curb line on each side of said avenue, together with the installation of such poles, conduits, and wires as may be necessary for the proper installation and equipment of said system, under Ordinance No. 15607, and under Ordinance No. 32807, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll.
